name: Don't Touch The Icy Spikes
description:
Make the little bird fly! Don't touch the icy spikes!

How far can you make it?

Don't Touch The Icy Spikes Support
If you like the game and want to support us, please write or update your review on the AppStore! Thank you very much.

Enjoy the game. Take a break, if needed.

Follow us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/appimize
